message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd be very interested in. It's worth $120 to me, and I'm offering it to you for $130.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $110 is unfortunately a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $115.  This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit. Let me know if you're interested!

I'm still interested in the product, but $115 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
